about.name: MICAELA DELMONTE
about.title: UIãƒ»Graphic Designer | Frontend Developer
about.content: I am a UI Designer, Frontend Developer, and Graphic Designer. I aim to create and provide designs that are visually pleasing and informative at the same time. I am always eager to learn new things from the experiences I accumulate through working with different people and different projects. With my current skills, I will work hard to provide good services while exerting efforts and enjoying what I am doing.

skills.name: UI Design
skills.description: Knowledge and experience in designing user interfaces using wireframing and prototyping tools/softwares.

skills.name: Frontend Development
skills.description: Knowledge and experience in frontend development using various frameworks, but mainly PHP and JavaScript frameworks.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.description: Knowledge and experience in designing posters, logos, pamphlets, etc. using various editing software of Adobe.
